title: Maebari Bishoujo Kessen!: Imagine Banner
original_name: MAEBARI 美少女決戦! イマジネ・バナー
sinopse: The story of a mysterious seal that links human mind with a toy, Imagine Banner, and Komitsu, who links with her figurine by applying Imagine Banners to her private parts and fights for the sake of her elder brother in this new-generation combat series, told through the eyes of a normal Japanese boy, Ginji Kudou.
